modName: Main Menu Theme Replacer - Lindsey Stirling
summary: Replaces the title song in the main menu with Lindsey Stirling's cover of the same song.
descriptionHtml:
Lindsey Stirling is an Indie musician who plays the violin. She has covered many popular songs using her violin. One such song is the Skyrim main theme.

Installation: Extract music folder from Lindsey Stirling.rar then place the music folder in your Skyrim data folder.

Credits:
Bethesda for Skyrim
Peter Hollens and Lindsey Stirling for the song.
author: Cultkiller
